fulltext:
TRẦN ĐÌNH PHÚ 
ADDRESS : 14/13/55 Thân Nhân Trung street, 13rd ward, Tân Bình district, Hồ Chí Minh city, Vietnam 
EMAIL : tran.dinh.phu.tb@gmail.com 
SKYPE ID : tran.dinh.phu.tb (available 8:00-17:00 GMT+7) 
PHONE NUMBER : +84908078123 (available 8:00-22:00 GMT+7) 
Fullstack/ backend developer 
PROFILE 
• I consider myself as a deep learner with knowledge of multiple fields, an out-of-the-box 
thinker, and a wannabe inventor. 
• Whoever has me on their team has a distinct advantage of a guy who solve hard problem, 
and archive things their competitor cannot do in time that matters, or at all. 
• Make impossible things possible, that's what I do. 
EXPERIENCES 
Pure Projects: SOFTWARE ENGINEER 
Project Pure system (legacy): Dec 2015 – now 
* Description: develop and maintain current software system of Pure. It contains various web apps, 
iOS app, Android app, and NAS. 
* Greatest achievement: Create Modularize Initiative: turn various parts in the apps into modules. 
Turning a 5 persons team from full-time maintenance jobs to part-time maintenance, part-time 
developing new features, thus increase value to customer. 
* 2nd greatest achievement: become de facto leader by popular vote 
Project Rebuild Pure system: Dec 2015 – now 
- First attempt: build system by Ruby on Rails 
+ Greatest achievement: combine all business logic and automation of the old system into a single 
source code 
- Second attempt: build system by .NET 
+ Greatest achievement: create a new security system that allow fine control over what user can 
and cannot do in the system 
Project Safety App: Dec 2015 – now 
* Greatest Achievement: First solo app to be used in production. I am to sole developer, analyzer 
and customer service staff. 
Page 1 of 4 
Arakrama.com: FREELANCE SOFTWARE DEVELOPER/ FOUNDER 
Apr 2015 – Sep 2015 
* Description: try to start an app development firm by myself. 
* Greatest achievement: Know my limit and back off before losing too much. 
ORO: SOFTWARE ENGINEER 
ZAC team member: Mar 2014 – Mar 2015 
* Description: develop and maintain ZAC: an ERP software solution 
* Greatest achievement: build data processor that is based on custom logic, with optimum 
performance. Solution is used company wide. 
Foneclay team member: Mar 2014 – Mar 2015 
* Description: Build and maintain phone template app 
* Greatest achievement: 
Time to market is 1 week for a whole template suit: main page, lock screen, alarm app, phone 
screen, a mini game... Teach team member how to do it. 
Fuuexpress .com:  FOUNDER 
Jan 2010 – Jan 2012 
* Description: a shipping service from US based stores to VN. 
* Greatest achievement: had long term customers and reliable revenue stream. Greatest financial 
success up till now. 
SKILL SET 
On the job training 
• Ruby on Rails 
• Visual Basic (from legacy system) 
• native Javascript, various Javascript libraries 
• CSS 
• SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL 
• Object-oriented programming 
• Functional programming 
• Procedural programming 
• Ubuntu, Apache 
• AWS (EC2, S3) 
Self-taught 
Page 2 of 4 
•  PHP  •  C# 
Books read 
• The Art of Readable Code 
• Why Programs Fail – A Guide to Systematic Debugging 
• Code Complete 2 
• Conceptual Blockbusting – A Pleasurable Guide to Better Problem Solving 
• Facts and Fallacies of Software Engineering 
• Software Project Survival Guide 
• Object Oriented Software Construction 
• Design Patterns 
• Refactoring - Improving the Design of Existing Code 
• JavaScript: The Good Parts 
• Algorithms 
• ...dozens more... 
English skill 
• TOEIC 915/990 score 
• Good reading, listening, speaking and writing skills 
FORMER EDUCATION 
Post and Telecommunication Institute of Technology (Vietnam) 
Major: Telecommunication 
Relevant course modules: 
• Computer architecture 
• Computer network 
• Basic C programming 
• Digital signal processing 
• Technical math 
Nguyễn Thượng Hiền high school (Vietnam) 
• Pass university admission test with 25/30 score 
Ngô Sĩ Liên junior high school (Vietnam) 
• Pass high school admission test with 57.5/62 score 
INTERESTS 
• Learning other fields: astronomy, mechanical engineering, construction, energy, biology, 
philosophy, history, geography... 
• Movies, music and video games, anything tech related. 
Page 3 of 4 
• Traveling/ riding bike alone 
COMPUTER SKILLS 
• MS office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint 
• Assemble and install a PC from parts 
• Troubleshooting common PC errors 
REFERENCE 
• I’m happy to supply these on request 
Page 4 of 4 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
